question: Which state government announced providing an additional 5 kg of rice under the Anna Bhagya scheme?

RBI has introduced a new mobile application, ‘RBIDATA’, offering seamless access to over 11,000 series of economic and financial data related to the Indian economy. Which of the following is NOT a feature of the RBIDATA app?
options: Users can access data related to SAARC countries.
It enables users to apply for RBI loans directly.
It provides information on macroeconomic statistics.
It provides time series data with graphical representations
answer: It enables users to apply for RBI loans directly.

question: SWAYATT Initiative, recently in news, is a:
options: e- learning platform launched by the Ministry of Education
platform launched by the RBI for Rural Regional Banks
an initiative for rural households to learn basic computer skills online
an initiative which invigorate participation of women-led enterprises and youth in public
answer: an initiative which invigorate participation of women-led enterprises and youth in public

question: Consider the following statements regarding HKU5-CoV-2, recently seen in the news:  1. It is a newly discovered bat coronavirus.  2. It has a lower binding affinity to human ACE2 than SARS-CoV-2, the virus behind COVID-19 pandemic.  Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
Why was Qualified Institutional Placement (QIP) introduced in India?
options: To reduce companies’ reliance on overseas fundraising methods
To allow only government-owned companies to raise capital
To eliminate the need for company audits
answer: To reduce companies’ reliance on overseas fundraising methods
